contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of September, 2013, the Application for Leave to File Original Process, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief, and the “Request for Opinion” are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994). The Prothonotary is directed to forward the filings to counsel of record.
